'the signs of his crucifying '' : the stigmata or marks of the nails and spear in the hands, feet and side. That such marks (sometimes accompanied by bleed- ing) have appeared in the bodies of some holy persons there can be no reasonable doubt. That, in the case of these persons or others, natural causes may produce such markings must also be admitted. That super- natural causes have sometimes been the sole or partial explanation there is nothing to disprove, and there are (in some cases) good reasons for believing.
